fields.label: Content
fields.name: mttr_flexible_bands
fields.instructions: Add a new band, which can have many elements inside it.

sub_fields.label: Reverse
sub_fields.name: reverse
sub_fields.message: Reverse flow and show sidebar first

sub_fields.label: Reverse
sub_fields.name: reverse
sub_fields.message: Reverse flow and show sidebar first

fields.label: Google Tag Manager ID
fields.name: mttr_google_tag_manager_id
fields.instructions: Only supply the GTM-XXXXXX code here, the entire script will be output at the top of the body tag.

fields.label: Icon Image
fields.name: mttr_feature_icon_image
fields.instructions: This field is optional - if an image is supplied, this will be used in place of the icon chosen above.

fields.label: Logo Alt
fields.name: mttr_options_brand_logo_alt
fields.instructions: This logo is used within the mobile header, which is ideal for a horizontal version.

fields.label: Postal Address
fields.name: mttr_options_contact_postal_address
fields.instructions: If different to the physical address

fields.label: Sidebar Content
fields.name: mttr_options_sidebar_content
fields.instructions: This content appears in the sidebar of standard pages. It does not appear on the home page or on full-width pages.

fields.label: Social Media
fields.name: mttr_option_social_media
fields.instructions: Add links to your social media accounts

fields.label: Hide Hero Image
fields.name: mttr_hide_hero_image
fields.message: Use a text hero only, no image
